item.description:
NOTE:We will not be meeting on our usual first Wednesday this month. Our October meeting will take place on the 17th.

 

Hello members and friends of IRN,

 

We are going to have combined IRN - SEC event for October.

The Scibelli Enterprise Center is kicking off its Emerging Growth Seminar Series on Tuesday, Sep 25 with a free seminar on “Pitfalls of Third Party Financing.”  This event comes to the SEC because of its membership in ACTION but companies don’t have to be cleantech to benefit from the content.

Please circulate freely and encourage companies and co-workers you work with to attend this FREE event.  Refreshments will be available.  Program will include networking, seminar, and more networking.

 


PITFALLS OF THIRD PARTY FINANCING
Scibelli Enterprise Center
Springfield, MA
Wednesday, October 17th, 2012
5:30 PM to 7:00 PM


Boston-based law firm, Bingham McCutchen, will deliver this highly relevant and worthwhile seminar and answer these questions:

* What should you be thinking about after you've already decided to pursue equity financing?


* What should you look out for?


* How should you structure the deal so you don't get your business taken away from you?


* How can you make it a win-win arrangement?


This seminar is part of Bingham's sponsorship of ACTION, but you don't have to be a cleantech company to benefit.

 

 

Schedule:

5:30 Refreshments and Networking
6:00 Seminar Start
6:30 Q&A and more networking
item.name: NEW DATE AND TIME - Making the Most of Third-Party Financing - October meeting
